spec_data.Name: yum-plugin-post-transaction-actions
spec_data.Description:
This plugin allows the user to run arbitrary actions immediately following a
transaction when specified packages are changed.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:02:57 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Yum plugin to run arbitrary commands when certain pkgs are acted on
